entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence near noon. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
